name: Abbie'sCulinaryNutrition
0:
”Alexa, open Abbie's Culinary Nutrition”
”What is Mise en Place?”
”How do I fix a dish that’s too spicy?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: abbie's culinary nutrition
des:
*Newly updated with video recipes! Are you looking for delicious, nutritious culinary inspiration? We’re here to help! Chef Abbie’s Culinary Nutrition Alexa skill is hosted by cookbook author, chef, and registered dietitian, Abbie Gellman.

Once you enable the skill, you can listen to daily audio recorded “How To” tips, Ask a Question, Find me a Recipe!. 

"HOW TO" DAILY TIP AUDIO SERIES: 
· How to make chicken stock
· How to poach an egg
· How to make the perfect filet mignon
· How to cook long-grain brown rice
· How to sear meat/chicken and many more!

SAMPLE QUESTIONS TO ASK:

- What is Mise en Place? 
- What is the difference between added and natural sugar? 
- What is sautéing?
- How do I defrost poultry?
- How do I fix a dish that’s too spicy?
- What type of oil should I use for marinades?
- How long does olive oil last?
- What are prebiotics and probiotics?
- Why is fiber important?
- Should I juice cleanse?

ABBIE’S CULINARY NUTRITION RECIPES:

- Browse through recipes on your Echo Show or FireTV or Voice Search a “recipe by name” or ask Alexa to “tell me a recipe” or "find me a recipe."

- Chef Abbie’s featured recipe collections include:
- Edamame Hummus
- Salmon Cakes with Lemon Crema 
- Crispy Chicken Thighs
- Pistachio Pesto
- Roasted Vegetables
- Cauliflower Tabbouleh
- Lamb Meatballs
- Roast Chicken with Sweet Potatoes

- Receive your recipe via weblink sent to your mobile device.
 
Here’s another way to explore Abbie’s Culinary Nutrition recipes: 

“Tell me a buttermilk chicken recipe”
“Find me a cauliflower recipe”
“Is there a recipe for beef stir fry?”
“Find me a salmon recipe”

Disclaimer: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.

ABOUT ABBIE GELLMAN
Abbie Gellman, MS RD CDN is a Chef and Registered Dietitian. She is a spokesperson, recipe and product developer, and educator. Abbie creates, produces, and hosts cooking and nutrition videos and works with a wide variety of food companies/brands/commodity boards, foodservice operators, health professionals, and private clients. She also contributes to many publications and her first cookbook, The Mediterranean DASH Diet, was published November 2019. You can find it here on Amazon.com!

Abbie is a member of the Science Advisory Board for Jenny Craig, providing ongoing cutting-edge counsel to update the education and lifestyle strategies of the company. Food & Nutrition Magazine awarded Abbie the 2017 Stone Soup Blogger of the Year. In addition, she is a member of Produce for Better Health’s elite influencer network, Fruit and Vegetable Ambassadors in Action.
Abbie lives in NYC with her daughter, Olivia, and many shelves of cookbooks.

Learn more about her at www.chefabbiegellman.com and www.culinarynutritioncuisine.com and connect with her @ChefAbbieGellman on Instagram and @ChefAbbieGellman on Facebook and YouTube.
